REGISTRATION_WELCOME_STEP_MESSAGE: We will help you create your account in just a few simple steps
REGISTRATION_PRIVACY_POLICY_STEP_TEXT: To finalize the registration process you need to click the button below. By clicking the button you agree on our
INCORRECT_PASSWORD_FORMAT_ERROR_MESSAGE: Password must have at least 6 characters and contain at least 1 number and 1 capital letter
INCORRECT_NAMES_FORMAT_ERROR_MESSAGE: The username must have at least 3 characters
NO_USERNAME_ERROR_MESSAGE: You have to provide a username
CANCEL_ACCOUNT_CREATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to cancel creating your account?
ALREADY_AN_ACCOUNT_WITH_EMAIL_ERROR_MESS: There already exists an account for this email address
MAXIMUM_4_PICTURES_ALLOWED_MESSAGE: A maximum of 4 pictures is allowed
YOU_HAVE_TO_ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: You have to activate your account in order to log in.
ACCOUNT_CONFIRM_TEXT2: There is just one last thing we need to do before we can let you in. Please confirm your email with the PIN code that we sent to you.
SEND_EMAIL_AGAIN_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure that you want us to send your confirmation email again?
WRONG_PIN_MESSAGE: The PIN number that you entered is not correct.
